metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14148 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Server-Server protocol implementation in ngIRCd before 26~rc2 allows an out-of-bounds access, as demonstrated by the IRC_NJOIN() function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-14148` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ngircd - 26-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ngircd package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '26-2').
